results.name: a(2n) = 2n, a(2n+1) = 4(n+1).
comment: Fourth column of table A210530 for n>0. - _Boris Putievskiy_, Jan 29 2013
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,2,0,-1).
program: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, if(n%2, a=2*n + 2, a=n); write("b066104.txt", n, " ", a) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Nov 14 2009
(PARI) concat([0], Vec(2*x*(x+2)/(1-x^2)^2 + O(x^50))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 24 2016
results.author: _George E. Antoniou_, Dec 04 2001
